steps.title: Check for long fingers and squared palms to determine if you have air hands.
steps.content: Check for long fingers and squared palms to determine if you have air hands. Take a close look at your hand to see how your palms and fingers are structured. While each person is unique, most hands can be grouped into different elemental types. You could also have Earth hands, which have angled palms and fingers. Water hands look more curved and tend to get sweatier, while fire hands look wide at the palm base and thinner at the fingertips. [1] X Research source While these categories are general, understanding the basic structure of your hands can help you discern the alignment of your fingers later on. To get the most accurate interpretation of your own life, study the fingers on your most dominant hand. You could also have psychic hands, which are more narrow and have thinner digits overall.

steps.title: Note that straight, balanced fingers indicate balance and strength in several aspects of your life.
steps.content: Note that straight, balanced fingers indicate balance and strength in several aspects of your life. Extend your hands and separate your fingers slightly to get a better look at each digit. Take a close look at your fingers and see if each one runs in a straight or crooked line. As you’d expect, straight, balanced fingers indicate balance and strength in specific aspects of your life. Crooked, leaning fingers, however, indicate points of weakness that you may struggle with. For example, if your forefinger is straight, it could mean that you're a strong leader with great ideas, while a bent forefinger could mean that you’re less good at taking control.

steps.title: Remember that curved fingertips indicate a more flexible personality.
steps.content: Remember that curved fingertips indicate a more flexible personality. Hold up each finger individually so you can take a close look at each fingertip. The points of your fingers provide a broader perspective on your personality and how you choose to approach life. Curved fingertips indicate a desire to please, as well as a dislike of conflict, while wide fingertips demonstrate a dislike of scheduled routine. For example, especially flat fingertips signify that you’re more detail-oriented, while pointed fingertips demonstrate an interest in paranormal, less scientific matters.

steps.title: Look at your pointer finger for insight into your leadership skills.
steps.content: Look at your pointer finger for insight into your leadership skills. Take a closer look at your forefinger, which is also referred to as your Jupiter finger. Similar to the purpose of the forefinger, the Jupiter finger points out your direction in life, indicating how outgoing or reserved you may be. A number of horizontal lines can signify a possible betrayal to come in a person’s life, while a larger number of vertical lines can indicate boosted thyroid health. [2] X Research source For example, if a person has an especially long forefinger, it could mean that they’re extremely ambitious and aiming for a leading position at work. If your forefinger is shorter than your ring finger, then you might have more stamina and be good at logic puzzles. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Examine the middle finger to get a better idea of your goals.
steps.content: Examine the middle finger to get a better idea of your goals. Survey your middle finger, or Saturn finger, to uncover your more domestic desires in life. The length of your middle finger matches the lengths a person is willing to go in order to achieve success and follow their dreams. If you see noticeable horizontal lines going up your middle finger, this could signify that you don’t feel very secure in your daily life and relationships, while a lot of upright lines mean that your pineal gland is healthy and strong. [4] X Research source For example, a person with a shorter middle finger might not have as many personal or professional goals driving them forward in life. If your middle finger is especially long, then you’ll be more driven to success.

steps.title: Scan your ring finger to better understand your creative side.
steps.content: Scan your ring finger to better understand your creative side. Glance over your fourth finger, or Apollo finger, to see how creative and attention-seeking you are as a person. Similar to its namesake, the Apollo finger indicates how creativity influences your life, as well as how much good fortune you’re going to have later on. If you see a lot of horizontal lines on this finger, it could be a sign that you’ll hit many obstacles on your road to success, while a lot of vertical lines can mean issues with your heart or thyroid. [5] X Research source For example, having a long ring finger could indicate your natural desire to take risks, such as betting money. If your ring finger is around the same length as your forefinger, you have a higher chance at getting married and staying in a committed relationship. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Survey your pinky to figure out how to connect with others.
steps.content: Survey your pinky to figure out how to connect with others. Examine your pinky finger to see your strengths and weaknesses in communication. Also known as the Mercury finger, your pinky finger indicates how well you bond and relate to others. As such, a longer pinky finger represents sturdy, healthy relationships, while a shorter pinky finger can equal immaturity. Excess horizontal lines on this finger indicate a lot of insecurity, while vertical lines are a sign of confidence. [7] X Research source For example, a person with a bent pinky might have manipulative tendencies. The longer your pinky is, the smarter you are.

steps.title: Inspect your thumb to determine your motivations.
steps.content: Inspect your thumb to determine your motivations. Get a sense of what factors guide your life by taking a closer look at your thumb. While a shorter thumb demonstrates that you aren’t as skilled at thinking for yourself, flexible thumbs imply wealth and durability. Additionally, the angle of your thumb from where it connects with a pointer finger tells it own story. [8] X Research source For example, someone with a longer thumb that joins the forefinger at a right angle might be flexible as well as a dependable worker. Thumbs connected at wide angles indicate soft and good-natured personalities, while thumbs connected at narrow angles signify more malicious personalities.
